textBeforeTable: Payment details returns - opens in a new window or tab. Refunds by law: In Australia, consumers have a legal right to obtain a refund from a business for goods purchased if the goods are faulty, not fit for purpose or don't match description. More information at You may return the item for any reason if you contact us within 7 days of its arrival. Item must be returned in unused condition in original unmarked packaging with all tags intact and with all manuals, warranty cards and other inclusions in new condition. Refund will be the item cost less shipping - shipping cost will be the greater of the actual shipping cost or the shipping cost on the listing and will generally be similar to what it costs you to return it to us. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return postage costs. Money Back 7 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given
textAfterTable: Seller's payment instructions Buyers outside Australia must use PayPal. Bank details for payment by bank deposit are available through eBay. I ship as soon as your payment appears in my account (can take up to 2 business days depending on which bank it is coming from). Cash deposits at a National Bank branch usually appear the same day.
